# Electron Secure Starter

## Profile
- Context: `contextIsolation: true`, `sandbox: true`, `nodeIntegration: false`, `devTools: prod=false`
- Preload: `contextBridge.exposeInMainWorld` で最小APIのみ
- IPC: `ipcMain.handle` / `ipcRenderer.invoke`
- shell: 許可ドメインのみ `openExternal`
- Protocol: `registerFileProtocol('safe', ...)` でpublic配下のみに制限
- CSP: meta(またはヘッダ)で `default-src 'self' safe:` + `script-src 'self' 'nonce-...'` or hash
- Navigation: `setWindowOpenHandler`/`will-navigate` で許可ドメインのみ

## References
- Spikes: `electron-secure-starter-minimal`, `electron-csp-nonce-hash-minimal`, `electron-protocol-file-safe-minimal`, `electron-navigation-restrictions-minimal`, `electron-sandbox-shell-allowlist`, `electron-csp-headers-devserver`.
